医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
扩展药物设计工具箱：用于定制分子的新酶西蒙·施罗德（Simon Schröder）研究出了如何使用酶更容易地在两个氮原子之间形成所需的键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Expanding-the-toolbox-for-drug-design-New-enzymes-for-tailoring-molecules.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Expanding-the-toolbox-for-drug-design-New-enzymes-for-tailoring-molecules.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e95f481f-9032-49e5-b43c-ace18339c0b3 Fri, 08 Dec 2023 21:01:48 -0500 Expanding the toolbox for drug design: New enzymes for tailoring molecules
研究确定了乳腺癌中的靶向融合RNA根据 2023 年 12 月 5 日至 9 日举行的圣安东尼奥乳腺癌研讨会上公布的结果，对一大群转移性乳腺肿瘤中存在的融合 RNA 进行全面分析，揭示了可能是治疗靶向的独特融合突变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Study-identizes-targetable-fusion-RNAs-in-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Study-identizes-targetable-fusion-RNAs-in-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db90e02e-4571-4d7e-b737-95561f2cddfa Fri, 08 Dec 2023 20:28:41 -0500 Study identifies targetable fusion RNAs in breast cancer
新指南为炎症性 RMD 患者的疲劳管理带来希望疲劳在患有炎症性风湿病和肌肉骨骼疾病（RMD）的人中很常见。疲劳的原因尚不清楚，而且很可能因人而异、随时间而变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/New-guidelines-offer-hope-for-fatigue-management-in-people-with-itis-RMD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/New-guidelines-offer-hope-for-fatigue-management-in-people-with-itis-RMD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5441474-a46f-4d1e-897c-ab3b2d1c0c2e Fri, 08 Dec 2023 19:47:42 -0500 New guidelines offer hope for fatigue management in people with inflammatory RMD
研究揭开了寨卡病毒多用途酶的秘密并揭示了治疗脆弱性病毒的遗传物质有限，蛋白质也很少，因此所有部分都必须加倍努力。寨卡病毒就是一个很好的例子。该病毒只产生 10 种蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Study-unlock-secrets-of-Zika-viruss-multi Purpose-enzyme-and-reveals-therapeutic-vulnerability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Study-unlock-secrets-of-Zika-viruss-multi Purpose-enzyme-and-reveals-therapeutic-vulnerability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa9c6424-a32b-4f3d-9fde-449be98cf054 Fri, 08 Dec 2023 19:40:20 -0500 Study unlock secrets of Zika virus's multipurpose enzyme and reveals therapeutic vulnerability
简单的筛查工具揭示了北卡罗来纳大学 IBD 诊所患者营养不良的患病率吃食物并吸收营养是每天都会发生的事情，但对于患有炎症性肠病的人来说，这种正常活动可能看起来有所不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Simple-screening-tool-reveals-the-prevalence-of-malnutrition-among-病人-at-UNCe28099s-IBD-clinic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Simple-screening-tool-reveals-the-prevalence-of-malnutrition-among-病人-at-UNCe28099s-IBD-clinic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0eaca28-2470-47af-a11a-22c5fc74cad6 Fri, 08 Dec 2023 19:34:23 -0500 Simple screening tool reveals the prevalence of malnutrition among patients at UNC’s IBD clinic
研究通过减少线粒体活性为心脏修复和再生带来新希望南佛罗里达大学健康心脏研究所的医生对心脏再生感到乐观。但当这些电池（称为心肌细胞的心肌细胞）短路并死亡时，损害可能是毁灭性的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Study-offers-new-hope-for-heart-repair-and-regenesis-with-reduced-mitochondrial-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Study-offers-new-hope-for-heart-repair-and-regenesis-with-reduced-mitochondrial-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=238cf089-089c-404e-915e-efb4079aed3c Fri, 08 Dec 2023 19:26:26 -0500 Study offers new hope for heart repair and regeneration with reduced mitochondrial activity
科学家揭示关键免疫系统成分的 3D 结构来自慕尼黑大学和亥姆霍兹感染研究中心的一个国际研究小组已经将所谓的 ASC 斑点的结构可视化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Scientists-unveil-3D-struct-of-key-immune-system-component.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Scientists-unveil-3D-struct-of-key-immune-system-component.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d086f5a8-26fc-4774-9444-8c0c2a683957 Fri, 08 Dec 2023 19:18:17 -0500 Scientists unveil 3D structure of key immune system component
接受化疗的女性可能无法从普通的生育保护药物中受益瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院的一项新研究发现，没有证据表明用于保护接受化疗的女性卵巢的常用药物会增加癌症治疗后生育孩子的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Women-undergoing-chemotherapy-may-not-benefit-from-common-fertility-protection-drug.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Women-undergoing-chemotherapy-may-not-benefit-from-common-fertility-protection-drug.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=316748c3-eb32-401e-8c25-ac5ef10aba28 Fri, 08 Dec 2023 19:17:20 -0500 Women undergoing chemotherapy may not benefit from common fertility protection drug
研究发现 12 月 0 日，大多数关于宫内节育器的 TikTok 视频都存在负面叙述与宫内节育器 (IUD) 相关的热门 TikTok 视频往往描述患者与疼痛相关的负面体验，而一些视频则传达了有关避孕装置的不可靠信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Majority-of-TikTok-videos-on-IUDs-present-negative-narratives-study-finds-December-0.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Majority-of-TikTok-videos-on-IUDs-present-negative-narratives-study-finds-December-0.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fc2c2e2-b45b-424b-a29d-685aae5d340e Fri, 08 Dec 2023 16:17:00 -0500 Majority of TikTok videos on IUDs present negative narratives, study finds December 0...
190 万英镑资金支持对英格兰各地健康差异和感染风险驱动因素的研究伦敦卫生与热带医学院 (LSHTM) 传染病建模副教授 Rosalind Eggo 博士获得了超过 190 万英镑的资助，用于领导对英格兰各地健康差异和相关传染病负担的驱动因素的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/c2a319-million-funding-supports-research-on-drivers-of-health-disparities-and-infection-risk-across-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/c2a319-million-funding-supports-research-on-drivers-of-health-disparities-and-infection-risk-across-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69ebfa6e-233f-4e5a-841c-db1c317dbb19 Fri, 08 Dec 2023 14:35:30 -0500 £1.9 million funding supports research on drivers of health disparities and infection risk across England
